meanings.definition: Multiple strands or fibers twisted together to form a single thread or yarn.
meanings.sent1: The multifilaments in this rope make it strong and durable.
meanings.sent2: She admired the softness of the fabric made from multifilaments.
meanings.sent3: The spider used multifilaments to knit a cozy hammock for itself.
meanings.sent4: The multifilaments of stories woven together created a rich tapestry of history.
meanings.sent5: The artist used multifilaments of color to create a vibrant painting.
